TextView.android:text: Post game nutrition is vital for effective recovery, particularly when players have less than 24 hours between games or training sessions. To recover optimally after a game or training an athlete should attempt to consume a meal or drink containing easily digestible carbohydrates and protein.After training the muscles are “hungry” for amino acids and glucose. By having this drink during this window the body is most effective at using the protein and carbs to trigger muscle protein synthesis and glycogen restoration. For this post workout meal the recommended carbohydrate intake is 1.0–1.2 g of carbohydrate/kg body weight and about 20-30 g protein.Basketball players should also be sure to consume a nutritionally balanced meal containing fats, carbs and protein around 2 -3hrs after their post game meal/shake.
